description: The intrusive tests decide whether a migrant is a child or an adult and there is no chance of appeal.
title: Medical test ordeal for young African migrants in Spain
title_page: Medical test ordeal for young African migrants in Spain - BBC News
maintext: "This is a girl who has been the victim of sexual abuse, and has been stripped naked in front of a doctor in the prosecutor's headquarters to determine, by the size of her breasts, whether or not she was older than she said," says Lourdes Reyz¨¢bal, president of the Ra¨ªces foundation, which works with unaccompanied foreign minors.
